variables.name: typing here your thought, if you explain in more detail, i think you will get a more accurate answer.
variables.description: Input for  typing here your thought, if you explain in more detail, i think you will get a more accurate answer.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""I want you to act a psychologist. i will provide you my thoughts. I want you to  give me scientific ..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
